text: is a Japanese futsal player who plays for Córdoba CF Futsal and the Japanese national futsal team. == Career == On 6 February 1997, he was born in Tokyo, Japan. He joined Fugador Sumida's youth team in 2014, aged seventeen. He made his senior debut with the top team in September 27, 2014, in F.League.フウガドールすみだ 清水和也選手×Soleil FUTSAL 望月充監督×FOOTBOZE FUTSAL U-18 豊田幸夫監督「高校生Fリーガーの原点を探る～前編～」 Futsal R In 2015-16, he won the F.League New Player Award. In July 2018, he moved to ElPozo Murcia FS B in the Spanish Second Division on loan.清水和也選手 期限付き移籍契約 基本合意のお知らせ Fugador Sumida. July 15, 2018 In August 2019, he joined Thái Sơn Nam in the Vietnam Futsal League on loan. He won the top scorer of the 2019 AFC Futsal Club Championship. In January 2020, he moved to Córdoba CF Futsal in the Spanish First Division on loan.日本代表・清水和也がエルポソからスペインのコルドバへ移籍！「さらに挑戦して行くことがベストだと決断し、コルドバへ移籍することにしました」 SAL. title: Kazuya Shimizu
